Module com.example.a50zo
Package com.example.a50zo.model

Class Card

java.lang.Object
com.example.a50zo.model.Card
public class Card extends Object
Represents a playing card with a rank and suit. Provides methods to get card values and image file names.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Cincuentazo Team

    • getSuit

      Gets the suit of the card.

      The card suit

    • getBestValue

      public int getBestValue(int currentSum)
      Gets the best value to play this card given the current table sum. For Aces, chooses between 1 and 10 based on which keeps the sum <= 50.
      Parameters:
      currentSum - The current sum on the table
      Returns:
      The best value to use for this card

    • canBePlayed

      public boolean canBePlayed(int currentSum)
      Checks if this card can be played given the current table sum.
      Parameters:
      currentSum - The current sum on the table
      Returns:
      true if playing this card keeps the sum <= 50

    • getImageFileName

      public String getImageFileName()
      Gets the image file name for this card. Format: [Rank][Suit].png (e.g., "2H.png", "AS.png")
      Returns:
      The image file name

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the card.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String in format "Rank of Suit"
